title: raaga rathna maalikache
sahitya:
rAga ratna mAlikacE ranjillunaTa hari shata

anupallavi

 bAga sEvinci sakala bhAgyamandudamu rArE

caraNam

 naigama SaDAstra purANAgamamArtha sahitamata yOgivarulu Anandamu nondEdu sanmArga maTa 
bhAgavatOttamulu gUDi pADE kIrtanamulaTa tyAgarAju kaDatEra tArakamaNi cEsina shata
